attributes.action: Stop so many immigrants entering the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this country is struggling to support the ammount of people flooding into it, housing, healthcare, police and bennefits agencies are all being over whelmed. 
we need to stop the ammount of immigrants  skilled or otherwise coming into our country.
we need to put money into training British people instead of recruiting from aboard, also a lot of these so called asylum seekers head straight for the Uk with no intention of working because they know they get everything for free at the expense of tax payers, why do they not settle in France, Germany,Spain Italy?
It is simply because the governments of these contries will not have them, but our government has no spine to stand up to European pressure, its time to stop  them..
